title: Pedro The Lion
description: No matter how dark or disastrous, there's always been an undercurrent of grace to the music of David Bazan. He returns to his Pedro the Lion moniker for this memorable Tiny Desk performance.
copyright: Copyright 2013-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
